name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Videomagic - Generate videos from webpages in minutes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate ready to publish videos from Amazon, Walmart, Shopify, Zillow and Realtor web links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Videomagic automatically extracts all the necessary information about your product or listing and uses that to create a ready-to-publish video. The generated video can be used in social media posts, online ads, as listing videos or for email marketing campaigns.
